Menu Builder

Overview

Development Basic, MySQL, Visual Basic
Team size Solo

Project description

This project was completed in my early years of high school on behalf of a friendâ€™s mom who owned a local lunch-selling service. As one of my first programming projects, I wanted to learn more about programming by designing a simple GUI app where I could simply work on the visuals using drag and drop (ie. to spend more time for developing functionality).

Responsibilities

  • Implemented user interaction events
  • Created database tables (eg. Menu, Customers, Orders) and wrote SQL statements to retrieve data
  • Developed user interface using Visual Basic
